snippet.title: Crazy Chicken: Pirates 3D (eShop/DSiWare) Trailer by Teyon
snippet.description:
Restore peace to Caribbean shores in Crazy Chicken Pirates 3D from August 16th in North America.  Only in Nintendo eShop for $1.99/€2 and on Nintendo DSiWare for 200 Nintendo DSi Points.

The splendor and beauty of Chicken Island would make it an ideal vacation spot - if it weren't for those pirates. A one-legged captain, a gunner, a cutlass-wielding chicken and a treasure hunter... the island is home to countless perils, hidden extras and mysteries. The lords of the island are by no means willing to surrender themselves and their treasure without a fight. Crazy Chicken Pirates 3D is a point & shoot action game where you take aim at birds as they scurry through the island and plunge bravely into the waves for a desperate counterattack. You only have 90 seconds to complete your raid by slaying pirates and collecting all hidden treasures.

©2012 phenomedia publishing gmbh. Licensed to and published by Teyon.

Official website: http://www.teyon.com/games
Twitter site: http://twitter.com/TeyonGames
Facebook page: http://facebook.com/TeyonGames
Flickr album: http://flickr.com/photos/TeyonGames
